plugins.name: Comments
plugins.description: Non-realtime (standalone) equivalent of Real-time collaborative comments. Allows for adding comments to any part of the rich-text content in CKEditor 5, including text and block elements such as embedded media or images. You can edit or delete comments and reply to them, creating discussion threads.

htmlOutput._comment: The plugin adds the `data-comment-end-after` and `data-comment-start-before` attributes to other elements on which the comment starts or ends.
